action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To make permanent the inclusion of stainless steel flatware and dinnerware in the requirement of the Secretary of Defense to buy certain items from American sources.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Ordinance Requiring Kitchenware Specifically Made in America Permanency Act of 2025 or the FORKS Made in America Permanency Act of 2025.

Section 842 of the Servicemember Quality of Life Improvement and National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025 (Public Law 118â€“159; 10 U.S.C. 4862 note) is amended by striking subsection (c).
